Lyric:
[by:hondoes]
[00:12.90]I remember how we used to be so beautiful
[00:15.91]You broke my heart at 16
[00:17.49]The first time I felt my world come crashing
[00:19.79]Black magic, like your heart was made of matches
[00:22.33]And I never got over it
[00:24.61]
[00:25.68]I swear your friends know when I post your photograph
[00:28.66]It doesn't really hurt, but it always takes me back to 16
[00:32.56]In your basement and your parents, my feelings

[00:35.15]And I never got over it
[00:37.34]
[00:38.50]How did you break my heart without even trying?
[00:44.98]How are you on my mind, you're not even talking to me
[00:51.37]You were made of matches, and you burned me to the ground
[00:57.70]You were made of matches, and you burned me down
[01:02.95]
[01:31.37]Everybody says that you're still living your life
[01:34.30]One weekend until the next still trying to get it right
[01:37.29]The truth is I worry that you never found something to escape who you used to be

[01:42.78]
[01:44.12]I found my own way of coping with your mess
[01:47.08]I found my own reasons why you weren't the best for me
[01:51.57]Why couldn't you be the best for me?
[01:55.18]
[01:56.86]How did you break my heart without even trying?
[02:03.40]How are you on my mind, you're not even talking to me
[02:09.58]You were made of matches, and you burned me to the ground
[02:16.11]You were made of matches, and you burned me down
[02:21.17]
[02:48.23]You were made of matches, and you burned me down
[02:55.93]I never got over it, I never got over it
